page.title: 03Law and Order 2 - Yardley
page.content: One of the policemen who does the beat in our area has been n the force fifteen years.He is attached to Sheldon station which is a Divisional Headquarters as well as being a local station.About 10% of the officers attached to the station are women.A constable covers a large area on his beat. He has a motorbike but sometimes walks part of his beat.He sometimes carries a truncheon with him usually at the weekend to aid him when arresting drunks. Fire arms can be issued to the police, but this has not happened in Sheldon for a number of years. The crime rate in Sheldon is high and increasing.The increase in violence together with new laws are thought by our policeman to be making his ob more difficult.He also felt the olice force was being criticised more by the public and politicians.
